t: What is the AWS CDK? - AWS Cloud Development Kit (AWS CDK) v2

t: AWS Cloud Development Kit - Wikipedia

t: AWS CDK Constructs - AWS Cloud Development Kit (AWS CDK) v2
s: Constructs are the basic building blocks of AWS Cloud Development Kit (AWS CDK) applications. A construct is a component within your application that represents one or more AWS CloudFormation resources and their configuration. You build your application, piece by piece, by importing and configuring ...

t: Getting started with the AWS CDK - AWS Cloud Development Kit (AWS CDK) v2
